message:
轉貼）

Join the frist g0v's hackathon @ Bangkok to hack a better society with all enthusiastic hackers, activists, designers, government officials and social innovators! 

So if there's not much Open Data out there, Let's make some of it! Call for Crawler makers, Civic hacker and all

IMPORTANT: This event is alongside APrIGF 2017, please make sure you also register on the APrIGF 2017 website in order to get the access and free food & drinks.
story: Che Wei Liu shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Ask not why nobody is doing this. You are the "nobody"! Join the frist g0v's hackathon @ Bangkok to
name: g0v@Bangkok hackath0n | Let's Make Some Data Open!
caption: g0v-jothon.kktix.cc
